amendment.description: In the nature of a substitute.

action.text: Amendment SA 2875 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Tester.
Point of order that the amendment violates section 302(f) of the CBA raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 2875.
Motion to waive all applicable budgetary discipline with respect to amendment SA 2875 made in Senate.
Motion to waive all applicable budgetary discipline with respect to amendment SA 2875 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 44. Record Vote Number: 204.
Amendment SA 2875 ruled out of order by the chair.
